title: 글래시즈 도전과제 베이스
content:
[[module CSS]]

.kabhover {
    text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
    color:black;
}
.kabhover:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
    border-bottom: none;
    color:#004c00;
}

.kabhover span {    display: none;}
.base .kabhover:hover span {
    position: absolute;
    display: inline;
    margin: 20px 0px;
    height: auto;
    min-height: 20px;
    width: auto;
    min-width: 250px;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate( -50% , 20px );
    background: #FFF;
    border: 1px solid #000;
    color: black;
    font-size: 110%;
    line-height: 1em;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: center;
    padding: 0.5em;
    z-index: 100;
}

.base .kabhover:hover span .image:first-child {
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}

.kabhover:hover span span {
    position: relative;
    margin: auto;
    height: auto;
    width: auto;
    border: none;
    padding: 0;
}

.kabhover span sub {
  line-height: 1.3;
  margin-top: 10px;
  display: inline-block;
  word-break: keep-all;
}

.kabadge {
    width: 14.28%;
    margin: 0;
}

[[/module]]

[[iftags -구성요소 -구성요소-백엔드]]

[[#ifexpr {$border} == 1 | @@@@ | [!-- ]]
[[module CSS]]
.base {
    border: solid #323232;
    border-width: 3px 0 3px 0;
    padding: 5px 0 5px 0;
}
[[/module]]
